title: Creating Campaign - Create a txt2win campaign
custom_preconds: Given the user has the rights to create a txt2win campaign
custom_steps:
When the user taps on the new campaign button
And selects txt2win
And fills out the necessary elements on the form
And the user taps on create
custom_expected: Then the user will be brought to the campaign page of the new campaign

title: Creating Campaign: Attempt to create a campaign without the ${wincode}
custom_preconds: Given the user has the rights to create a txt2win campaign
custom_steps:
When the user taps on the new campaign button
And selects txt2win
And enters in txt for the 'Winner SMS MT' but leaves out the ${wincode}
And enters all necessary elements to the form 
And taps on create
custom_expected:
Then there will be a red error message next 'Required Field'
And no new campaign will be created

title: Creating Campaign - Verify character count is accurate
custom_preconds:
Given the user can create a txt2win campaign
And the user is on the 'New Text2win Campaign' page
custom_steps:
When the user enters characters in either the 

Max Votes Exceeded SMS MT
Confirmation Message
Winner SMS MT
Consolation Message
custom_expected: Then the 'Character Remaining' count should decrease accordingly

title: Creating Campaign - Add informational message
custom_preconds:
Given the user has the ability to create a txt2win campaign
And the user is on the 'New txt2win Campaign'
custom_steps: When the user taps on the 'Add Message'  button in the Informational Messages section
custom_expected: Then the user will see new fields (Keyword, Response SMS MT) to enter as required

title: Creating Campaign - Verify help links
custom_preconds:
Given the user has the ability to create a txt2win campaign
And the user is on the 'New txt2win campaign' page
custom_steps: When the user taps the help links next to most fields
custom_expected: Then the popup notification will be relevant to the field

title: Edit Campaign - Edit campaign
custom_preconds:
Given there is a txt2win campaign
And that campaign has never been started
custom_steps:
When the user updates a field like the confirmation message text
And taps the update button
custom_expected:
Then the user will be brought back to the campaign page
And the field should reflect the update

title: Starting Campaign - Starting campaign from campaign page
custom_preconds:
Given there is a txt2win campaign created
And that campaign is either in the created or stopped state
And the user is on the campaign page for that txt2win campaign
custom_steps:
When the user taps not the start button
And taps on the ok button on the confirmation page
And taps on click here
custom_expected:
Then the user will be brought back to the campaign page
And the start button will gone
And there will be a stop button
And there will be no edit button
And in campaign run summary section there will be a new row
And the end date for that row will be 'Running[view['

title: Starting Campaign - Starting campaign from All Campaign page
custom_preconds:
Given there is a txt2security campaign either in a created or stopped state
And the user is on the All Campaigns page
custom_steps:
When the user taps on the created or stopped button in the action column
And taps on ok button on the confirmation popup
And taps close
custom_expected:
Then the All Campaigns page will reload
And in the action column for that campaign the button will say Running
And the campaign will be filtered with the to the top with the other running campaigns
And the Last Run date will update to the current date and time
And the the row's text will turn green

title: Testing Campaign - Send text to campaign
custom_preconds:
Given there is a txt2win campaign created
And that campaign has been started
And the user is on the campaign page
custom_steps:
When the user sends a text to the short code
And taps the inbox
custom_expected: Then the user will see the text they just sent in

title: Testing Campaign - Send text with an '@' symbol in it
custom_preconds:
Given there is a txt2win campaign created
And that campaign has been started
And the user is on the campaign page
custom_steps:
When the user sends a text with an '@' to the short code
And taps the inbox
custom_expected: Then the user will see the text they just sent in

title: Testing Campaign - Pick a winner
custom_preconds:
Given there is a txt2screen campaign created
And that campaign has been started
And the user is on the campaign page
And the user has already sent in a text
custom_steps:
When enters in 1 for how many winners you would like to choose
And taps on 'Pick'
And tap ok on the confirmation page
And taps click here
custom_expected:
Then the user will receive a txt on their phone with the winner txt
And the winner code

title: Stopping Campaign - Stopping campaign from All Campaign page
custom_preconds:
Given there is a txt2security campaign either in a created or stopped state
And the user is on the All Campaigns page
custom_steps:
When the user taps on the running button in the action column
And taps on ok button on the confirmation popup
And taps close
custom_expected:
Then the All Campaigns page will reload
And in the action column for that campaign will be a stopped button
And the row's text will turn to black
